experience.responsibilities: Developed high-performance distributed systems using C++ to analyze large-scale datasets. Optimized memory management protocols in Java-based simulation environments, resulting in a 15% increase in computational throughput for algorithm testing.

Collaborated on a project exploring automated bug detection in concurrent systems. Implemented a prototype analysis tool in C++ and conducted empirical evaluations to validate the efficiency of various multithreading models.
